reviewText: I highly recommend the quigley's village dvds. They are well done and teach good lessons to the children.

This is a wonderful Christian show for children. The puppets are precious and Mr. Quigley is like a Mr. Rogers.
I highly recommend!

OUr family loves Quigley's Village!  The animals are cute and very funny, the songs are catchy, and their is always a great moral to each story.  We now own all of the Quigley's Vllage videos.  My 3 year old all the way up to my 14 year old enjoy these!
